# Camouflage (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Druid Spells|Druid 1]], [[1st Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 10 minutes/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 43

*Upon finishing the spell, your skin and clothing change color, warping tint and hue to match your surroundings.*

Throughout the duration of the spell, your coloration changes instantly to match the background of any new environment you enter, with no effort on your part. This effect grants you a +10 circumstance bonus on [[Stealth (Skill)|Stealth]] (3.5 Hide) checks.
